title: ~ East Austin New 1bd - 1 month free - Parking included - W/D in unit
posting_body: 💰 Listed price is factoring in the special of 1 month free over a 14-month lease term.
🏠 This is a very unique 1bd floor-plan.
The living room and kitchen offer a ton of space to customize however you like.
The white finishes offer a clean, modern feels very neutral for someone to customize.
👌🏼 This community is only 2 miles to the heart of East Austin, mins to Manor, walkable to the metro rail, and easy access to Mueller.
☀ With each unit you get w/dryer included and 1 parking spot included.
There are no common amenities but the lower base rent and access to everything out your door makes it worth it.
😄 I'm a licensed Apartment locator and get paid by the properties so my service is 100% free.
I have been doing this job for over 5 years.
I love what I do and my goal is to make your apartment search as easy and smooth as possible.
Don't hesitate to text or call me and use my knowledge of Austin's market to assure you get a great deal on your next apartment.
